data.name: Alejandro Batres
data.bio:
I'm a 'random' software developer, I'm studying Engineering in Computer Science and I've done many projects during my career.

I'm still learning and improving my dev skills in programming languages like C, C++, Java, Python, and recently JavaScript.

By the way, if you are reading this right now, let me tell you that this page is still in construction, lol.
